name: Seven Second Samurai
description:
A "best 2 out of 3" rock paper scissors match that plays out as a samurai duel.  

Instructions:

  • As soon as lightning strikes, choose your selection!
  • You only have a small window to make an input, if you're too soon or too late, you lose.
  • the following round(s) will happen almost immediately after, so be sure to make an input as soon as you see the icons available!

Controls

  • Player 1
    • Left shift: Rock
    • Z : Paper
    • X : Scissors
  • Player 2
    • Left arrow: Rock
    • Down arrow: Paper
    • Right arrow: Scissors
  • Enter key starts a new match
  • Escape takes you to the menu

Notes

  • Fantastic settings are the default and the game will not work at a low frame rate.  "Good" works well on most recent laptops.
  • The player models are free for public use and downloaded from blendswap.
